t: Amazon.com: Equate Beauty Hydrating Cleanser, 12 fl oz : Beauty & Personal Care
s: I'm allergic to specific chemicals that are found in many so-called "clean" face products. This is a great cleanser for my rosacea skin. I use Albolene to remove the copious amounts of sunscreen and makeup I use every day. i wipe the Albolene off w/ tissues, then finish w/ this Equate cleanser.
